hero.title: Konekte. Kolabore. Kree.
hero.subtitle: Social Colab enn platform kot nou pa pran okenn komisyon. Wi: 0% komisyon lor bann kolaborasyon ant bann mark ek bann influanser lokal.

whatWeAre.title: We are a 0% commission platform
whatWeAre.p1: At Social Colab, we believe in fostering direct, transparent, and fruitful relationships. That's why we've built the first-ever 0% commission platform in Mauritius, dedicated to connecting local brands with a vetted community of creators. Our model is simple: you pay for the plan, not the connection. No hidden fees, no percentages of your campaign budget taken away. Just a flat, predictable subscription.
whatWeAre.p2: This approach empowers brands to maximize their marketing spend and allows creators to keep 100% of their earnings from collaborations. It's a win-win that encourages more authentic partnerships and a stronger creative economy for our island.

features.title: Nou Ena Bann Zouti Lantelizans Artifisyel Pou Tou Dimoun
features.subtitle: Kit ou enn bizness pe elarzi so mark, ouswa enn influanser pe rod bon partenarya, nou platform donn zot bann zouti ki bizin pou reysi.

brands.title: Servi Lantelizans Artifisyel
brands.description: Arete perdi letan. Nou sistem intelizan matche ou mark avek bann influanser ki zot lodyans koresponn avek ou sib demografik.

brands.title: Zere Ou Bann Kanpagn San Traka
brands.description: Depi koumansman ziska fin, zere tou ou kanpagn depi enn sel plas. Nou zouti integre fer kolaborasyon vinn fasil.

brands.title: Analiz Anplas
brands.description: Swiv performans lor tablo-de-bor: ROI, nivo langazman, ek krwasans followers pou kapav ajiste ou stratezi.

creators.title: Dekouver Bann Mark Otantik
creators.description: Konekte avek bann mark ki alinye avek ou valer ek stil konteni. Trouv partenarya solid ek dirab.

creators.title: Montre To Potansyel
creators.description: Kree enn profil profesyonnel (kouma enn media kit): met ou meyer travay ek done demografik lodyans pou atir bann mark.

creators.title: Fer Bann Deal An Sekirite
creators.description: Zere propozisyon, kontra ek peyman dan enn sel plas. Nou sistem asire to peyman ar ler, sak fwa.

showcase.title: Zwenn Nou Bann Kreater
showcase.subtitle: Dekouver bann talan ki kapav fer ou mark rezone.

jobs.title: Kanpagn Aktif
jobs.subtitle: Enn seleksyon lokazion pou kolabor avek bann gran mark Morisyen.

pricing.title: Swazir To Plan
pricing.subtitle: Pricing sinp ek transparan. Okenn fre kasiet.

tiers.name: GRATIS
features: Aksè limite lor nou set zouti

tiers.name: STANDARD
tiers.description: Pou bann bizness ek influanser pe grandi
features: Aksè a tou nou set zouti

tiers.name: PRO
tiers.description: Pou bann ekip ki pe al scale

testimonials.title: Bann Mark ek Influanser Satisfet
testimonials.subtitle: Get seki nou itilizater pe dir lor Social Colab.

cta.title: Pare Pou Amelyor To Mark?
cta.subtitle: Rezwenn nou lor platform azordi mem. Annou koumans enn partenarya solid ki amenn vre rezilta.

footer.tagline: Nou konekte bann mark ek bann influanser lokal pou kree bann kanpagn ki fer zefè.
